tasks.label: build compress
tasks.command: cd build && if ls | grep Makefile; then echo using make.. && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make compress; else echo using ninja... && ninja src/compress; fi;

tasks.label: build active file
tasks.command: cd build && if ls | grep Makefile; then echo using make... && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && make ${fileBasenameNoExtension}; else echo using ninja... && ninja ${relativeFileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}; fi;
